name: ui-test
description: No-code E2E testing framework - record and replay browser tests with YAML

scripts.preinstall: node -e "const path=require('node:path');const env=process.env;const isTrue=(v)=>String(v??'').toLowerCase()==='true';const isExec=String(env.npm_command??'').trim()==='exec';const isRepo=Boolean(env.INIT_CWD)&&path.resolve(env.INIT_CWD)===path.resolve(process.cwd());if(isExec||isTrue(env.npm_config_global)||isRepo)process.exit(0);const msg=['[ui-test] Standalone install policy: project-local installs are not supported.','','Install/run ui-test in standalone mode instead:','  npm i -g ui-test','  ui-test setup quickstart','  npx -y github:ddv1982/easy-e2e-testing setup quickstart','','If ui-test is already installed in this project, clean it up:','  1) Remove ui-test from dependencies/devDependencies in package.json','  2) Run: npm uninstall ui-test','  3) Run: npm i -g ui-test','  4) Re-run: ui-test setup quickstart'];console.error(msg.join('\\n'));process.exit(1);"
